com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate

Class VolumeEvaluationStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate.VolumeEvaluationStage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OfferEvaluationStage

    public final class VolumeEvaluationStage
extends java.lang.Object
implements OfferEvaluationStage
    This class evaluates an offer against a given PodInstanceRequirement, ensuring that it contains an appropriately-sized volume, and creating any necessary instances of ReserveOfferRecommendation and CreateOfferRecommendation as necessary.

      • evaluate

        public EvaluationOutcome evaluate(MesosResourcePool mesosResourcePool,
                                  PodInfoBuilder podInfoBuilder)
        Description copied from interface: OfferEvaluationStage
        Evaluate the given offer (in the form of a MesosResourcePool, modifying the deducting used resources from the pool, and creating the appropriate EvaluationOutcome.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface OfferEvaluationStage
        Parameters:
        mesosResourcePool - the available resources left available for this stage to consume
        podInfoBuilder - the grouping of all task and executor builders for the pod
        Returns:
        an EvaluationOutcome describing whether this evaluation stage succeeded or failed, and why
